sections.content:
Question:
Do you provide a motor evaluation environment for RX26T?
Answer:
We provide MCK-RX26T Renesas Flexible Motor Control Kit for MCU and motor evaluation using RX26T.
MCK-RX26T Renesas Flexible Motor Control Kit :
The MCK-RX26T is a development kit that makes it easy to evaluate motor control via a permanent magnet synchronous motor (brushless DC motor). With this kit and sample software downloadable from the website or Renesas Motor Workbench 3.0, user can immediately start evaluating motor control with the RX26T. 
(Included: MCB-RX26T Type A, inverter board (MCI-LV-1), communication board (MC-COM), permanent magnet synchronous motor, and accessories (cables, spacers, etc.)) 
The sample software can be downloaded below.
RX26T Sensorless vector control for permanent magnet synchronous motor
RX26T Sensorless vector control with one shunt for permanent magnet synchronous motor
RX26T Vector control for permanent magnet synchronous motor with encoder
Suitable Products
RX26T
